title: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, the call to prayer is from the Sunnah of the Prophet through which he calls people to prayer and reminds that the time for prayer has ended, and it is repeated five times a day and the impression of the people around him after hearing the call in a dream is based on what was stated in the translator’s book. In Sirin,” so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the call to prayer in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream, he said a number of opinions on various occasions, including: If a person sees in a dream That he stands on a mountain or stands on a high place and calls to prayer, this means that this person will have a high status among people and in the coming period he will assume a high position. Whoever reads the call and his voice was loud and no one heard him or paid attention to him, this is evidence that this person will live with Unjust people, but if this person does not know these people, this means: he will leave. To a new place, but the family there will not accept his presence. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the call to prayer in a dream: If the dreamer calls the call to prayer at the Kaaba, this indicates that this person is committing an heretical act and calling on others to spread it. If the dreamer sees himself reciting the call to prayer once or twice, then performing the prayer After him and performs the obligatory prayer on him, this indicates that he will visit the Sacred House of God within a year. If the monarch gives permission to pray inside the Kaaba, this is evidence that this person will be exposed to illness during the coming period. But if he sees that he is calling for prayer in his house, this means that one of the people of that house will die from God. Interpretation of dreams to see the call to prayer in a dream, interpretation NabulsiImam Nabulsi will talk about this dream and said that there are different interpretations depending on the form of the vision and we will present you with some of them. If the dreamer sees that he is calling for prayer on the walls, this indicates that this person is calling two people to peace. And whoever calls for pigeons, this indicates that he is committing many sins. And that he will not be praised in the hereafter or in this world. If a person sees in a dream that he is called to pray in the street, this means that he urges others to do good and asks them to stay away from evil. If a person sees that he is asked to pray on the roof of his neighbor, this indicates that This person is betraying his neighbor among his family. If this person hears the call to prayer in a dream, but hates hearing it, this indicates that there are disreputable people calling on him to do something bad. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream is an auspicious dream, especially if the sound behind the call is beautiful and the person is transformed. After hearing the call to prayer, proceed to immediate prayer.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a thief in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream: Stealing or seeing a thief in a dream is one of the most common visions that people wander around and search for its meaning, as it is one of the most important taboos that the heavenly religions prohibit and urge avoiding. So, what does it mean to see a thief in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a thief in a dream The interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream depends on many things, including: If he is robbed more than once, this indicates the many difficulties that the dreamer is going through and the evil that accompanies him wherever he goes. If the fortuneteller sees If a thief enters the house, this is evidence of the importance of caution and not trusting people quickly, and an indication of the necessity of reconsidering the things that the fortuneteller believes to be true, and that there is a hand playing along and stealing his money without realizing it. Theft is a sign of hypocrisy, cowardice, and a large number of Enemies. The thief also symbolizes, according to some interpreters, the common smell of death in the home or the angel of death, because he visits homes without permission and kidnaps souls in the blink of an eye. And if you see that you are dealing with him or talking to you, this indicates that you did not choose your companions well, or Enemies are trying to approach you to catch you, and they may be near you at work or study. Therefore, you must be careful in all your movements and do not trust anyone, no matter how much you sacrifice, until the purpose behind the sacrifice becomes clear. Seeing a thief putting his hand in your pocket and stealing money in front of your eyes is a sign that someone is saying something against you that does not concern you and is tarnishing your reputation in front of others. Stealing clothes means A serious illness and a lot of problems and psychological conflicts. Stealing food is an indication of the abundance of goodness in the dreamer’s home, which can happen at any time, so he may travel for a period of time that may extend to a year or more to provide for his family and them. Compensation for what happened. The thief symbolizes the return of the absent person from travel or exile, as the suitor suggests, because his presence is a surprise to the family. If something beloved is stolen from the house, this is a sign of the loss of a loved one. If you see a thief stealing and you leave him and do not prevent him from doing so You are making illegal money from your work or participating in a suspicious business, and if you catch him and go to the police, this is a sign that you will know your enemies, eliminate them, and promote them at work. And if you see that you are chasing a thief in a dream, then you are defending a cause or following a principle in your life and you will not abandon it. The principle may expose its owner to constant ridicule or difficulty coexisting. If someone accuses you of theft despite your justification for doing so, this indicates bad news or the presence of someone who brings you evil and hatred and may set a trap for you and you fall into it. The fortuneteller should be careful if he is asked. By going to a place to do work and this place is suspicious or if one of his friends asks him to keep some money in his house, this could be reported as theft. A thief in the workplace is a sign of financial distress and difficulties he may face, such as being fired from work or humiliated due to negligence. title: Interpretation of praying upon the Prophet in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream is apparently from the goodness of the person, because even in his dream he sees himself praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, and this indicates that the person will experience comfort in his life. Praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, is one of the characteristics of righteous Muslims who remember The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and they had a vision of this dream in a dream. The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream We will talk through the site differently regarding the interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream through the following points: When a woman sees herself praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream, this indicates That she will be blessed with goodness. Seeing prayers upon the Prophet indicates that he is one of God’s righteous servants. When there are young children in the dream of prayer, this indicates the approach of a trick. Interpretation of a dream of praying upon the Prophet for a married woman. Among the interpretations of praying for the Prophet in a dream for a married woman is that if she sees Her husband is in front of her in a dream and she prayed for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, this means that she is. A good and pious woman should have plenty of food and be happy, God willing. If a married woman sees herself in a dream with her children around her, and she supplicates for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, and her children chant with her, then this indicates that this house is blessed, and that God Almighty May God bless you. In the near future.Interpretation of the absolute followers of praying upon the Prophet.Interpretation of praying upon the Prophet in a dream indicates that God Almighty will provide her with immediate sustenance and that this is a good matter that God brings to her and her eyes will perceive it.If a married woman sees her ex-husband and he is next to her and prays upon the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. This indicates that her righteous relative is coming to her and she must announce this vision because it is a happy dream. If a divorced woman sees her husband performing the prayer and then prays to the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, this indicates that God will soon bring them together with kindness and goodness, and she must pray to God Almighty. Always give her goodness. The meaning of seeing a man praying for the Prophet. Whoever sees in a dream that he is praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a large mosque, and repeats the prayer for the Prophet, this indicates that he will obtain great sustenance and that it will be so. He is free from many of the problems that he faces in his life. The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream for a man may be that he is in abundance of sustenance, especially if he sees himself sitting in a mosque repeating prayers for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. This morning indicates that it is good. Seeing prayers upon the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees her husband and children sitting in a meeting, reciting supplications and praying upon the Prophet, this means that she will have a righteous son who will pray upon her. He will be with her only, God willing. If a woman sees her unborn child in her dream and prays for the Prophet, it means that the child will be righteous and reconcile with his mother, and he must pray to God. Glory be to Him to protect the child for her. Interpretation of the vision of praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, for young people. title: Interpretation of a tiger in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of a tiger in a dream in different cases. This animal, which is considered one of the fastest animals on the face of the Earth, exceeds the speed of a car traveling at a speed of two hundred and sixty kilometers, and it is one of the fiercest animals on the planet, but what does it symbolize? To someone who sees a married, pregnant, and unmarried woman in a dream and what are the circumstances under which he can see her, join us in finding out the answer to these questions through the following lines from our article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a tiger in The dream means severing ties of kinship and many difficulties and problems that the dreamer will be exposed to. His vision may also indicate that he will leave his friends or loved ones after long problems arise between them that they cannot solve. Whoever sees a tiger attacking him is evidence that he will be in trouble. And if one sees that a tiger bites him This is a warning to him that there will be a quarrel between him and the one he loves. But they will be able to overcome it no matter how long or short the fight between them is. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees a tiger in her dream, it is good news for her that she will soon marry a good, God-fearing man within her who will not persecute her or take away her rights. If she sees a tiger skin appearing on the net that the suitor will give it to her, it means that it will be a valuable and unconventional gift, and she will enjoy it and open her heart. Seeing a tiger attacking her. It is an indication that there are many men around her who admire her and would like to propose to her. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman to see a tiger is good news for her that God will grant her many good things. Seeing it also foretells that she will live a calm and stable life with her husband who loves her very much and always seeks To please her and does not let disputes occur in their lives, and always seeks to solve these problems. And if she sees in her dream that she is hugging a tiger, it is good that God will grant her a pregnancy soon. When a married woman dreams of a black tiger, this is a sign warning her that there is someone who wants to spoil her life and ruin the relationship between them. And between her husband, so she must keep the secrets of her home and not let anyone. To interfere between her and her husband. Some commentators believe that seeing a black tiger in a dream is evidence of what this woman suffers from her husband’s bad nature. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a tiger in her dream, this is good news that she will give birth to a boy, and that her pregnancy will be good and she will give birth. Safely, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger attack in a dream. Some interpreters believe that a person who dreams of a tiger attack is a sign of loss or failure that the dreamer will experience in his life and it is also a sign of poverty and a narrow situation that the person will suffer from. Whoever sees that a tiger is chasing him in a dream, this means that the person is suffering from some anxiety and problems in his life, and he is trying to overcome them. He must seek the help of God Almighty and pray to Him to save him from what is inside him. If the dreamer is able to escape from the tiger in the dream,

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a mosque or minaret? This means that you will visit the Holy Kaaba soon. What is the meaning of seeing a sick person dreaming that he is calling beside him? It means that his term is coming, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the call coming out of your home? This vision draws your attention to the occurrence of a sad event. The meaning of seeing a prisoner receiving the call In his prison? It means being released soon. What is the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer from someone you hate? This means that you are accusing him of lying. The interpretation of seeing hearing the call to prayer. The call to prayer in a mosque or minaret means visiting the Kaaba soon, perhaps this year. If you raise the call to prayer inside a well, this is work New and you share this work with your friends. Dream that you work as a muezzin and you are not a muezzin, because the money you get from a halal source is a lot. The prisoner who receives the call in prison means that he will be released soon. The concerned or sad person who gives the call to prayer means freedom from worry And sadness. A sick person who dreams that someone is calling to his side means that his death is near, and God knows best. Dreaming of hearing the call to prayer for a married woman. When you see yourself hearing the call to prayer coming out of your house, this dream draws your attention to the occurrence of a sad event, such as the death of one of those who live with you in the house. Hearing the call to prayer In a dream for a married woman, it is a sign of a lot of goodness that she will enjoy, after a period of misery and anxiety. For a woman who suffers from marital strife or among her husband’s family, hearing the call to prayer here means the beginning of a solution to these problems and a decent life for her. If you dream of a call to prayer Above the Kaaba, this means that you are a person who seeks to spread unrest and misleading rumors. If you hear the call to prayer inside the Kaaba, this means that you will face a number of psychological and health problems. Dream of Azan for individuals. Ibn Shaheen said that a dream of hearing the call to prayer for a man who has never married means marriage soon, while if you receive the call from a roof A friend or neighbor, it means that you will cheat on that man with his wife. And if you hear the call to prayer in a market where people are selling their goods, this means the death of a person in that place. Ibn Shaheen said about him listening to the call to prayer and the Iqama at the same time: death disease. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for married peopleHearing the call to prayer From someone you hate means that you accuse him of lying. It was said about seeing the call to prayer from your enemy, which means that you will reveal a secret that he will reveal to his people. If you change the words of the call to prayer, it means that you are doing injustice to those around you, and that you are not responsible. The interpretation of seeing a man’s call to prayer in his home is an attempt to reconcile him with His wife and ending the differences between them. A dream of hearing the call to individual prayer. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for an unmarried woman indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If the girl is working in a project or trading in the markets, this means money, livelihood, and blessings in her trade. Interpretation of a dream about calling to prayer at a well for an unmarried woman means Traveling to a distant country for work or education.

title: Interpretation of trees in a dream and seeing a tree in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about trees means good children and means kindness, comfort, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, like dry trees, cutting green. Trees, seeing high or tall trees, planting a tree, or seeing the firewood of cut trees according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi and others. Continuing the topic: Interpretation of trees in a dream. Trees indicate women and men who differ in morals. Seeing trees indicates disagreements, and unknown trees are a sign of anxiety. And anxiety, especially if you see it in a dream at night. If he was an innovator, he ended it, or if he was an infidel, he converted to Islam. If the dreamer is an infidel, a Muslim, or a sinner who repents. So what was it? Among the trees, especially for scents, such as henna and rose trees, it indicates those with justice and knowledge without action or words without action. Seeing what is distinctive of the smell and spices such as oranges and lemons is specific to the smells and spices such as oranges and lemons, action, word and deed. Seeing what distinguishes the flavored and not the poisoned , such as palms and walnuts, denotes gentlemen who obtain what they have only by toil and toil. Seeing something that cannot be eaten or smelled, such as poplar and cypress trees, indicates stinginess and greed. Every tree that drops its leaves shows poverty, wealth, preservation, forgetfulness, joys and sadness. Every tree whose leaves do not fall is a sign of longevity, continuity of sustenance, wealth, and steadfastness in religion. Whoever sees that he is lying in trees, his children will be multiplied. Whoever plants a tree and hangs it, he will marry people and be honored. Trees that do not bear fruit show people extreme cruelty, they have no money and no goodness with them. A tree with thorns is a difficult man. Whoever sees that he is cutting down a tree, his wife will die, and if the tree withers, a sick person will die there. The bark of a tree is a blessing. Whoever sees himself planting trees in the orchard, children will be born to him. Whoever sees that trees surround a mountain, the offspring of that city will multiply. The tree in front of the house indicates the following. The tree that God spoke to Moses, peace be upon him, indicates closeness to God Almighty. The tree indicates the blessings of God Almighty, and the dry tree represents guidance and provision. Sitting under the tree with people is evidence of God’s satisfaction. If the person seeing it is an infidel, a Muslim, or a sinner, he will repent. Seeing a blessed tree in a dream indicates good results. Whoever sees that he reaps from a tree other than his fruit, he will take money that is not permissible. It was said: Cutting trees is a disease that affects the cutter and his family. The tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book The Great Interpretation of Dreams that seeing a tree in a dream A sign of a man or a woman. Seeing green trees whose leaves are a sign of a happy and successful life, while seeing dry trees whose leaves are falling is evidence of boredom, loneliness and failure, and seeing a tree falling from a tree in a dream is a sign of failure, failure and trouble. As for seeing planting or planting a tree In a dream, it is an indication of a successful project, marriage, or trip, and watering trees in a dream is an indication of beautiful words

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake at home?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house: There is no doubt that seeing a black snake causes a lot of panic and anxiety for some of us, especially if it is seen in the house where the person lives, so we find him quickly searching for the special meaning of this vision. You know what it symbolizes specifically, and this vision differs clearly due to the multiplicity of details that a person sees in a dream, as he sees that he is killing the snake, fighting with it, or talking with it, and what is important is that we clarify all the details by mentioning all its other indicators. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house: Seeing a snake in general is a vision that symbolizes a cunning and cunning enemy, and the degree of hostility is determined based on the color of the snake. If the snake is black, this indicates a fierce enemy who kills others without a reason behind it. If the snake falls under wild snakes, this indicates competitors who are trying to gain The position that the fortuneteller occupies in any way or the enemies who are strangers to him. His vision also expresses the problems and difficulties of life that he faces on every path he follows and the feeling of complete inability to rise up and get rid of the problems that accumulate day after day in his life. And if he sees the snake, he speaks to him in a conversation Praiseworthy, this indicates that he has reached an impossible goal or that he is reaping a great benefit that will reshape his life again. As for the black snake, if the fortuneteller speaks about it, it is magic or actions that are intended to harm others, especially if what he hears from the snake is strange and cannot be understood. If a person sees that he controls the snake, submits to it and obeys it, then it symbolizes a high position, high position and authority, and the qualities of glory, honor and courage. If the black snake is in the bathroom, this indicates bad intentions and deviation from the right path and the presence of an envious eye hiding in the fortuneteller and wanting evil. However, if black snakes multiply in his house, this is evidence of the presence of evil forces and spirits in his house, and they must be eliminated with God’s help, reciting the Holy Qur’an, and observing the legal ruqyah. At all times. Psychologically, this vision expresses the negative energy that passes through the house and negatively affects its residents, and the result is clear in the disputes that arise between the dreamer and his family, in the recurring crises in his work and within himself. The miserable failure that a person encounters in his studies if he is a student. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the snake is a symbol of complicity in doing evil and evil, and it is a symbol of temptation and falling into temptation. This vision expresses the accursed Satan, because he revealed to the serpent that Adam and Eve were tempted by what God forbade from the tree and eating from it. Whoever sees a black snake in a dream, beware of his enemies, because they are very dangerous, and one must escape from them. And if you see that you are fighting with this type of snake, it symbolizes life’s battles and conflicts that it fights. The visionary in his life, whether with others or within himself. This vision shows that the visionary’s conflicts are not only external, represented by the outbreak of wars between him and his enemies, but also internal, as

Interpretation of a dream about roses for a married woman: Seeing roses in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is living in a state of affairs. Of extreme psychological stability, because she wants to avoid anything that makes her feel uncomfortable. If the dreamer sees roses in her dream, this is a sign of the good news that she will receive in the coming days and that will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees roses in her dream and plants them, this indicates that she is keen She is very keen on providing all the comforts for her children and raising them well. A woman’s dream of seeing roses that she receives as a gift symbolizes the good things that will happen in her life and make her feel satisfied. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream for a married woman who sees roses as a sign that she will receive A lot of money that will enable her to live her life the way she wants. If the dreamer sees roses in her dream, and they are in a certain number, this is a sign that she will have children with the same number of these flowers. The dreamer seeing roses in her dream symbolizes abundant goodness that She will be blessed with it in the coming days and it will make her well off. If a woman sees wilted roses in her dream, this is a sign of the many ordeals that she will suffer and that will bother her greatly. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a pregnant woman: Seeing roses in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will not face any difficulty at all during the birth of her child. And she will enjoy seeing her safe from any harm. If a woman sees roses in her dream, this is a sign that the gender of the fetus will become female, and God Almighty is aware of these matters and her awareness. If a woman sees roses in her dream and receives them as a gift from someone, this indicates the approaching date of the birth of her child. And her willingness at that time to receive him with longing and enthusiasm. The dreamer who sees roses in his dream indicates that she wants to follow her doctor’s instructions carefully to avoid any harm to the newborn. Seeing pink roses in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream with a pink rose is a sign of good news that she will receive and will make her happy. Her best ever. If the dreamer sees pink roses in her dream while she is still newly married, this indicates that at that time she was carrying a child in her womb, but she does not realize it at the moment. In case the dreamer sees pink roses in her dream and her husband gives them to a woman Other, this indicates that he betrayed her, but she has not realized anything yet. A woman’s dream of a pink rose that turns black symbolizes that she will go through a period full of problems and as a result her psychological state will deteriorate greatly. Seeing white roses in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream with White roses mean that she overcame the difficulties she faced in her life and will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees roses

title: Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing beautiful teeth? An indication of the end of problems, worries, and sorrow. What is the meaning of seeing rotten teeth? A sign of the dreamer’s bad reputation and bad morals. Do you see a married woman losing her teeth? An indication of the occurrence of sad circumstances. What is the purpose of seeing the upper teeth? Indicating Sisters, sons, father, and uncle. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out of her hands? An indication of a serious psychological crisis. Meaning of seeing a single woman’s teeth falling out? A sign of frustration and disappointment. Do you see teeth falling out of place? A sign of illness. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream. If the dreamer sees teeth Beautiful in a dream, this indicates the end of problems, worries and sorrows. While seeing upper teeth in a dream symbolizes the men of the house, and God knows best. When a fortuneteller sees falling teeth in a dream, details of women from the dreamer’s household. Whoever sees black, corroded teeth in his dream, this means that the dreamer will be exposed To serious consequences. If the dreamer sees yellow teeth in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from diseases. Seeing rotting teeth in the sleeper’s dream is evidence of the dreamer’s bad reputation and bad morals. Teeth falling out in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her teeth are falling out in a dream, this indicates The arrival of sad circumstances. When she sees in her dream that her teeth are falling out of her hand, this means that she will go through great financial hardship. A female seeing her teeth falling out in her sleep is a sign of many problems and marital disputes. This dream can also indicate the cessation of offspring and the inability to have children again. Anyone who dreams that his teeth are falling out, this is evidence of instability or cohesion between family members. If she is pregnant and sees her teeth falling out of her hand, this indicates the birth of a boy. Interpretation of seeing glass teeth: Whoever sees in his dream that his teeth are made of glass or wood, this means that there will be Death defeats him. But if it is silver, this is almost evidence of damage. If the teeth are of gold, then this is evidence of the imminence of hellfire or illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream for a single woman: When a virgin girl sees shiny teeth in a dream, this is an indication of the strength of the family bond. But if the upper teeth are seen in a dream, it is a sign of brothers, children, and father. And the uncle. See the girl with one tooth falling out in a dream. A sample of her relationship with an inappropriate young man. If she sees in a dream that her teeth fall into her hands, this is a sign that she will be exposed to a serious psychological crisis. This vision in a Virgo girl’s dream can also indicate a feeling of confusion, despair, and disappointment. Hope. Anyone who sees her teeth falling out without blood in his dream is evidence of the longevity of insight. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing teeth in a dream refers to family, friends and relatives. Seeing bright white teeth in a dream is a sign of kinship, love and affection. While seeing the front teeth in a dream symbolizes relatives of men, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the lower teeth in the

title: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, the call to prayer is from the Sunnah of the Prophet through which he calls people to prayer and reminds that the time for prayer has ended, and it is repeated five times a day and the impression of the people around him after hearing the call in a dream is based on what was stated in the translator’s book. In Sirin,” so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the call to prayer in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream, he said a number of opinions on various occasions, including: If a person sees in a dream That he stands on a mountain or stands on a high place and calls to prayer, this means that this person will have a high status among people and in the coming period he will assume a high position. Whoever reads the call and his voice was loud and no one heard him or paid attention to him, this is evidence that this person will live with Unjust people, but if this person does not know these people, this means: he will leave. To a new place, but the family there will not accept his presence. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the call to prayer in a dream: If the dreamer calls the call to prayer at the Kaaba, this indicates that this person is committing an heretical act and calling on others to spread it. If the dreamer sees himself reciting the call to prayer once or twice, then performing the prayer After him and performs the obligatory prayer on him, this indicates that he will visit the Sacred House of God within a year. If the monarch gives permission to pray inside the Kaaba, this is evidence that this person will be exposed to illness during the coming period. But if he sees that he is calling for prayer in his house, this means that one of the people of that house will die from God. Interpretation of dreams to see the call to prayer in a dream, interpretation Nabulsi Imam Nabulsi will talk about this dream and said that there are different interpretations depending on the form of the vision and we will present you with some of them. If the dreamer sees that he is calling for prayer on the walls, this indicates that this person is calling two people to peace. And whoever calls for pigeons, this indicates that he is committing many sins. And that he will not be praised in the hereafter or in this world. If a person sees in a dream that he is called to pray in the street, this means that he urges others to do good and asks them to stay away from evil. If a person sees that he is asked to pray on the roof of his neighbor, this indicates that This person is betraying his neighbor among his family. If this person hears the call to prayer in a dream, but hates hearing it, this indicates that there are disreputable people calling on him to do something bad. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream is an auspicious dream, especially if the sound behind the call is beautiful and the person is transformed. After hearing the call to prayer, proceed to immediate prayer.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a thief according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream Theft or seeing a thief in a dream is one of the most common visions that people wander around and search for its meaning, as it is one of the most important taboos that heavenly religions prohibit and urge to avoid. So, what does it mean to see a thief in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a thief in a dream The interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream depends on many things, including: If he is robbed more than once, this indicates the many difficulties that the dreamer is going through and the evil that accompanies him wherever he goes. If the fortune teller sees a thief entering the house, this is evidence of the importance of caution and not trusting people quickly, and an indication of the need to reconsider the things that the fortune teller believes are correct, and that there is a hand playing along and stealing his money without realizing it. Theft is a sign of hypocrisy, cowardice and a large number of enemies. The thief also symbolizes, according to some interpreters, the smell of death that is common in the house or the angel of death, because he visits homes without permission and kidnaps souls in the blink of an eye. And if you see that you are dealing with him or talking to you, this indicates that you did not choose your companions well, or that enemies are trying to get close to you to catch you, and they may be near you at work or study. Therefore, you must be careful in all your movements and do not trust anyone no matter how much you sacrifice until the purpose behind the sacrifice becomes clear. Seeing a thief putting his hand in your pocket and stealing money in front of your eyes is a sign that there is someone who says something against you that does not concern you and tarnishes your reputation in front of others. Stealing clothes means a serious illness and many problems and psychological conflicts. Stealing food is an indication of the abundance of goodness in the dreamer's home, which can happen at any time, so he may travel for a period of time that may extend to a year or more to support his family and provide for them. Compensation for what happened. The thief symbolizes the return of the absent from travel or exile, as the suitor suggests, because his presence is a surprise to the family. And if a beloved thing is stolen from the house, this is a sign of the loss of a loved one. If you see a thief stealing and you leave him and do not prevent him from doing so, then you are earning illegal money from your work or participating in a suspicious business, and if you catch him and go to the police, this is a sign of your knowledge of enemies and their extermination and promotion at work. And if you see that you are chasing a thief in a dream, then you are defending a cause or following a principle in your life and will not abandon it, and the principle can expose its owner to constant ridicule or difficulty in coexistence. And if someone accuses you of stealing despite your justification for it, this indicates bad news or the presence of someone who brings you evil and hatred and may set a trap for you and you fall into it, so the fortune teller should be careful if asked. By going to a place to do work and this place is suspicious or if one of his friends asks him to keep some money in his house, this can be reported as theft. A thief in the workplace is a sign of financial distress and difficulties that he may face, such as dismissal from work or insult due to negligence. Praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, is one of the characteristics of righteous Muslims who remember The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and they had a vision of this dream in a dream. The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream We will talk through the site differently regarding the interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream through the following points: When a woman sees herself praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream, this indicates That she will be blessed with goodness. Seeing prayers upon the Prophet indicates that he is one of God’s righteous servants. When there are young children in the dream of prayer, this indicates the approach of a trick. If a married woman sees herself in a dream with her children around her, and she supplicates for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, and her children chant with her, then this indicates that this house is blessed, and that God Almighty May God bless you. This indicates that her righteous relative is coming to her and she must announce this vision because it is a happy dream. Always give her goodness. The meaning of seeing a man praying for the Prophet. Whoever sees in a dream that he is praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a large mosque, and repeats the prayer for the Prophet, this indicates that he will obtain great sustenance and that it will be so. He is free from many of the problems that he faces in his life. The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream for a man may be that he is in abundance of sustenance, especially if he sees himself sitting in a mosque repeating prayers for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. This morning indicates that it is good. Seeing prayers upon the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees her husband and children sitting in a meeting, reciting supplications and praying upon the Prophet, this means that she will have a righteous son who will pray upon her. He will be with her only, God willing. title: Interpretation of a tiger in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of a tiger in a dream in different cases. This animal, which is considered one of the fastest animals on the face of the Earth, exceeds the speed of a car traveling at a speed of two hundred and sixty kilometers, and it is one of the fiercest animals on the planet, but what does it symbolize? To someone who sees a married, pregnant, and unmarried woman in a dream and what are the circumstances under which he can see her, join us in finding out the answer to these questions through the following lines from our article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a tiger in The dream means severing ties of kinship and many difficulties and problems that the dreamer will be exposed to. His vision may also indicate that he will leave his friends or loved ones after long problems arise between them that they cannot solve. Whoever sees a tiger attacking him is evidence that he will be in trouble. And if one sees that a tiger bites him This is a warning to him that there will be a quarrel between him and the one he loves. But they will be able to overcome it no matter how long or short the fight between them is. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees a tiger in her dream, it is good news for her that she will soon marry a good, God-fearing man within her who will not persecute her or take away her rights. If she sees a tiger skin appearing on the net that the suitor will give it to her, it means that it will be a valuable and unconventional gift, and she will enjoy it and open her heart. Seeing a tiger attacking her. It is an indication that there are many men around her who admire her and would like to propose to her. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman to see a tiger is good news for her that God will grant her many good things. Seeing it also foretells that she will live a calm and stable life with her husband who loves her very much and always seeks To please her and does not let disputes occur in their lives, and always seeks to solve these problems. And if she sees in her dream that she is hugging a tiger, it is good that God will grant her a pregnancy soon. When a married woman dreams of a black tiger, this is a sign warning her that there is someone who wants to spoil her life and ruin the relationship between them. And between her husband, so she must keep the secrets of her home and not let anyone. To interfere between her and her husband. Some commentators believe that seeing a black tiger in a dream is evidence of what this woman is suffering from her husband’s bad nature. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a tiger in her dream, this is good news that she will give birth to a boy, and that her pregnancy will be good and she will give birth. Safely, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger attack in a dream. Some interpreters believe that a person who dreams of a tiger attack is a sign of loss or failure that the dreamer will experience in his life and it is also a sign of poverty and a narrow situation that the person will suffer from. Whoever sees that a tiger is chasing him in a dream, this means that the person is suffering from some anxiety and problems in his life, and he is trying to overcome them. He must seek the help of Almighty God and pray to Him to save him from what is inside him. If the dreamer is able to escape from the tiger in the dream,

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a mosque or minaret? This means that you will visit the Holy Kaaba soon. What is the meaning of seeing a sick person dreaming that he is calling beside him? It means that his term is coming, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the call coming out of your home? This vision draws your attention to the occurrence of a sad event. The meaning of seeing a prisoner receiving the call In his prison? It means being released soon. What is the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer from someone you hate? This means that you are accusing him of lying. The interpretation of seeing hearing the call to prayer. The call to prayer in a mosque or minaret means visiting the Kaaba soon, perhaps this year. If you raise the call to prayer inside a well, this is work New and you share this work with your friends. Dream that you work as a muezzin and you are not a muezzin, because the money you get from a halal source is a lot. The prisoner who receives the call in prison means that he will be released soon. The concerned or sad person who gives the call to prayer means freedom from worry And sadness. A sick person who dreams that someone is calling to his side means that his death is near, and God knows best. Dreaming of hearing the call to prayer for a married woman. When you see yourself hearing the call to prayer coming out of your house, this dream draws your attention to the occurrence of a sad event, such as the death of one of those who live with you in the house. Hearing the call to prayer In a dream for a married woman, it is a sign of a lot of goodness that she will enjoy, after a period of misery and anxiety. For a woman who suffers from marital strife or among her husband’s family, hearing the call to prayer here means the beginning of a solution to these problems and a decent life for her. If you dream of a call to prayer Above the Kaaba, this means that you are a person who seeks to spread unrest and misleading rumors. If you hear the call to prayer inside the Kaaba, this means that you will face a number of psychological and health problems. Dream of Azan for individuals. Ibn Shaheen said that a dream of hearing the call to prayer for a man who has never married means marriage soon, while if you receive the call from a roof A friend or neighbor, it means that you will cheat on that man with his wife. And if you hear the call to prayer in a market where people are selling their goods, this means the death of a person in that place. Ibn Shaheen said about him listening to the call to prayer and the Iqama at the same time: death disease. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for married peopleHearing the call to prayer From someone you hate means that you accuse him of lying. It was said about seeing the call to prayer from your enemy, which means that you will reveal a secret that he will reveal to his people. If you change the words of the call to prayer, it means that you are doing injustice to those around you, and that you are not responsible. The interpretation of seeing a man’s call to prayer in his home is an attempt to reconcile him with His wife and ending the differences between them. A dream of hearing the call to individual prayer. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for an unmarried woman indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If the girl is working in a project or trading in the markets, this means money, livelihood, and blessings in her trade. Interpretation of a dream about calling to prayer at a well for an unmarried woman means Traveling to a distant country for work or education.

Ibn Shaheen said about him listening to the call to prayer and the Iqama at the same time: death disease. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for married peopleHearing the call to prayer From someone you hate means that you accuse him of lying. It was said about seeing the call to prayer from your enemy, which means that you will reveal a secret that he will reveal to his people. If you change the words of the call to prayer, it means that you are doing injustice to those around you, and that you are not responsible. The interpretation of seeing a man’s call to prayer in his home is an attempt to reconcile him with His wife and ending the differences between them. A dream of hearing the call to individual prayer. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for an unmarried woman indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If the girl is working in a project or trading in the markets, this means money, livelihood, and blessings in her trade. Interpretation of a dream about calling to prayer at a well for an unmarried woman means Traveling to a distant country for work or education.

title: Interpretation of trees in a dream and seeing a tree in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about trees means good children and means kindness, comfort, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, like dry trees, cutting green. Trees, seeing high or tall trees, planting a tree, or seeing the firewood of cut trees according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi and others. Continuing the topic: Interpretation of trees in a dream. Trees indicate women and men who differ in morals. Seeing trees indicates disagreements, and unknown trees are a sign of anxiety. And anxiety, especially if you see it in a dream at night. If he was an innovator, he ended it, or if he was an infidel, he converted to Islam. If the dreamer is an infidel, a Muslim, or a sinner who repents. So what was it? Among the trees, especially for scents, such as henna and rose trees, it indicates those with justice and knowledge without action or words without action. Seeing what is distinctive for the smell and spices such as orange and lemon , such as palms and walnuts, denotes gentlemen who only obtain what they have by toil and toil. Seeing something that cannot be eaten or smelled, such as poplar and cypress trees, indicates stinginess and greed. Every tree that drops its leaves shows poverty, wealth, preservation, forgetfulness, joys and sadness. Every tree whose leaves do not fall is a sign of longevity, continuity of sustenance, wealth, and steadfastness in religion. Whoever sees that he is lying in trees, his children will be multiplied. Whoever plants a tree and hangs it, he will marry people and be honored. Trees that do not bear fruit show people extreme cruelty, they have no money and no goodness with them. A tree with thorns is a difficult man. Whoever sees that he is cutting down a tree, his wife will die, and if the tree withers, a sick person will die there. The bark of a tree is a blessing. Whoever sees himself planting trees in the orchard, children will be born to him. Whoever sees that trees surround a mountain, the offspring of that city will multiply. The tree in front of the house indicates the following. The tree that God spoke to Moses, peace be upon him, indicates closeness to God Almighty. The tree indicates the blessings of God Almighty, and the dry tree represents guidance and provision. Sitting under the tree with people is evidence of God’s satisfaction. If the person seeing it is an infidel, a Muslim, or a sinner, he will repent. Seeing a blessed tree in a dream indicates good results. Whoever sees that he reaps from a tree other than his fruit, he will take money that is not permissible. It was said: Cutting trees is a disease that affects the cutter and his family. The tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book The Great Interpretation of Dreams that seeing a tree in a dream A sign of a man or a woman. Seeing green trees whose leaves are a sign of a happy and successful life, while seeing dry trees whose leaves are falling is evidence of boredom, loneliness and failure, and seeing a tree falling from a tree in a dream is a sign of failure, failure and trouble. As for seeing planting or planting a tree In a dream, it is an indication of a successful project, marriage, or trip, and watering trees in a dream is an indication of beautiful words

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house: There is no doubt that seeing a black snake causes a lot of panic and anxiety for some of us, especially if it is seen in the house where the person lives, so we find him quickly searching for the special meaning of this vision. You know what it symbolizes specifically, and this vision differs clearly due to the multiplicity of details that a person sees in a dream, as he sees that he is killing the snake, fighting with it, or talking with it, and what is important is that we clarify all the details by mentioning all its other indicators. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house: Seeing a snake in general is a vision that symbolizes a cunning and cunning enemy, and the degree of hostility is determined based on the color of the snake. If the snake is black, this indicates a fierce enemy who kills others without a reason behind it. If the snake falls under wild snakes, this indicates competitors who are trying to gain The position that the fortuneteller occupies in any way or the enemies who are strangers to him. His vision also expresses the problems and difficulties of life that he faces on every path he follows and the feeling of complete inability to rise up and get rid of the problems that accumulate day after day in his life. And if he sees the snake, he speaks to him in a conversation Praiseworthy, this indicates that he has reached an impossible goal or that he is reaping a great benefit that will reshape his life again. As for the black snake, if the fortuneteller speaks about it, it is magic or actions that are intended to harm others, especially if what he hears from the snake is strange and cannot be understood. If a person sees that he controls the snake, submits to it and obeys it, then it symbolizes a high position, high position and authority, and the qualities of glory, honor and courage. If the black snake is in the bathroom, this indicates bad intentions and deviation from the right path and the presence of an envious eye hiding in the fortuneteller and wanting evil. However, if black snakes multiply in his house, this is evidence of the presence of evil forces and spirits in his house, and they must be eliminated with God’s help, reciting the Holy Qur’an, and observing the legal ruqyah. At all times. Psychologically, this vision expresses the negative energy that passes through the house and negatively affects its residents, and the result is clear in the disputes that arise between the dreamer and his family, in the recurring crises in his work and within himself. The miserable failure that a person encounters in his studies if he is a student. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the snake is a symbol of complicity in doing evil and evil, and it is a symbol of temptation and falling into temptation. This vision expresses the accursed Satan, because he revealed to the serpent that Adam and Eve were tempted by what God forbade from the tree and eating from it. Whoever sees a black snake in a dream, beware of his enemies, because they are very dangerous, and one must escape from them. And if you see that you are fighting with this type of snake, it symbolizes life’s battles and conflicts that it fights. The visionary in his life, whether with others or within himself. This vision shows that the visionary’s conflicts are not only external, represented by the outbreak of wars between him and his enemies, but also internal, as

If the dreamer sees roses in her dream, this is a sign of the good news that she will receive in the coming days and that will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees roses in her dream and plants them, this indicates that she is keen She is very keen on providing all the comforts for her children and raising them well. A woman’s dream of seeing roses that she receives as a gift symbolizes the good things that will happen in her life and make her feel satisfied. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The dreamer seeing roses in her dream symbolizes abundant goodness that She will be blessed with it in the coming days and it will make her well off. If a woman sees wilted roses in her dream, this is a sign of the many ordeals that she will suffer and that will bother her greatly. title: Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing beautiful teeth? An indication of the end of problems, worries, and sorrow. What is the meaning of seeing rotten teeth? A sign of the dreamer’s bad reputation and bad morals. Do you see a married woman losing her teeth? An indication of the occurrence of sad circumstances. What is the purpose of seeing the upper teeth? Indicating Sisters, sons, father, and uncle. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out of her hands? An indication of a serious psychological crisis. Meaning of seeing a single woman’s teeth falling out? A sign of frustration and disappointment. Do you see teeth falling out of place? A sign of illness. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream. If the dreamer sees teeth Beautiful in a dream, this indicates the end of problems, worries and sorrows. While seeing upper teeth in a dream symbolizes the men of the house, and God knows best. When a fortuneteller sees falling teeth in a dream, details of women from the dreamer’s household. Whoever sees black, corroded teeth in his dream, this means that the dreamer will be exposed To serious consequences. If the dreamer sees yellow teeth in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from diseases. Seeing rotting teeth in the sleeper’s dream is evidence of the dreamer’s bad reputation and bad morals. Teeth falling out in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her teeth are falling out in a dream, this indicates The arrival of sad circumstances. When she sees in her dream that her teeth are falling into her hand, this means that she will go through great financial hardship. A female seeing her teeth falling out in her sleep is a sign of many marital problems and disputes. This dream can also indicate the cessation of offspring and the inability to have children again. Anyone who dreams that his teeth are falling out, this is evidence of instability or cohesion between family members. If she is pregnant and sees her teeth falling out of her hand, this indicates the birth of a boy. Interpretation of seeing glass teeth: Whoever sees in his dream that his teeth are made of glass or wood, this means that there will be Death defeats him. But if it is silver, this is almost evidence of damage. If the teeth are made of gold, then this is evidence of the imminence of hellfire or illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream for a single woman: When a virgin girl sees shiny teeth in a dream, this is an indication of the strength of the family bond. But if the upper teeth are seen in a dream, it is a sign of brothers, children, and father. And the uncle. See the girl. One tooth falling out in a dream. A sample of her relationship with an inappropriate young man. If she sees in a dream that her teeth are falling into her hands, this is a sign that she will be exposed to a serious psychological crisis. This vision in a Virgo girl’s dream can also indicate a feeling of confusion, despair, and disappointment. Hope. Anyone who sees her teeth falling out without blood in his dream is evidence of the longevity of insight. Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing teeth in a dream refers to family, friends and relatives. Seeing bright white teeth in a dream is a sign of kinship, love and affection.
